params.id: GUID for the grant to refund.

create((address,uint256,uint256)[],(addr.details: Grant creation function. May be called by grantors, grantees, or any other relevant party.

params.currency: (Optional) If null, amount is in wei, otherwise address of ERC20-compliant contract.
params.expiration: (Optional) Block number after which votes OR funds (dependant on GrantType) cannot be sent.
params.extraData: Support for extensions to the Standard.
params.grantManagers: (Optional) Weighted managers of distribution of funds.
params.grantType: Which grant success scheme to apply to this grant.
params.grantees: Recipients of unlocked funds and their respective allocations.
params.targetFunding: (Optional) Funding threshold required to release funds.

params.id: GUID for the grant to fund.
params.value: Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.

fund(bytes32,uint256).return: Cumulative funding received for this grant.

params.id: GUID for the grant to fund.
params.value: Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.

payout(bytes32,address,uint256).return: Remaining funding available in this grant.

params.id: GUID for the grant to refund.
params.value: Amount in WEI or GRAINS to fund.

params.id: GUID for the grant to refund.
The ID of the grant to vote in favor for.
params.token: Address of token or NULL for Ether based vote.
params.value: Number of votes denoted in Token GRAINs or WEI.
